basics.name: Amy Shin
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.S. in Computer Science in the Department of Information and Computer Sciences at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in Spring, 2025.

work.summary: Head of online presence for Ka Leo
highlights: Engaging with customers to personalize their drinks and providing product recommendations.
Communicating effectively to coordinate tasks, share customer preferences, and maintain smooth operations.
Taking orders, assisting customers in choosing flavors, and customizing sundaes or ice cream cakes based on their preferences.
Adhering to food safety regulations, including properly storing ingredients, regularly cleaning equipment, and maintaining health and safety standards.

awards.title: Academic recognition award
awards.summary: Awarded to graduating students who complete a rigorous high school curriculum with a minimum overall GPA of 3.0.
